Tool

NameImport DXF Files
ID0
Author(c) 2007 by O.Conrad

Description

This module imports DXF files using the free "dxflib" library. Get more information about this library from the RibbonSoft homepage at: http://www.ribbonsoft.com/dxflib.html

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Output
Shapes (*)Shapes list (optional output)SHAPES
Tables (*)Shapes list (optional output)TABLES
Options
FileFile pathFILE
Import FilterChoiceFILTERAvailable Choices: [0] all entities [1] only entities with layer definition [2] only entities without layer definition Default: 1
Circle Point Distance [Degree]Floating pointDCIRCLEMinimum: 0.010000 Maximum: 45.000000 Default: 5.000000
(*) optional
